contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of November, 2013, the Order of the Superior Court is hereby affirmed on the basis of the majority en banc opinion of the Superior Court, Commonwealth v. Greene, 25 A.3d 359 (Pa.Super.2011).
Justice EAKIN would enter a per curiam affirmance.
Chief Justice CASTILLE files a dissenting statement.
